One of the best Quotes I read:


  • “ Justice consists not in being neutral between right and wrong, but finding out the right and upholding it, wherever found, against the wrong. ”

    — Theodore Roosevelt.


  • “ There is nothing outside of yourself that can ever enable you to get better, stronger, richer, quicker, or smarter. Everything is within. Everything exists. Seek nothing outside of yourself. ”

    — Miyamoto Musashi.


  • “ Iron is full of impurities that weaken it; through forging, by exposure to heat, cold and hammering, the impurities are forced out and the iron is transformed into razor-sharp steel. Human beings develop in the same fashion. ”

    — Morihei Ueshiba.


  • “ The secret of Happiness is Freedom, and the secret of Freedom, Courage. ”


  • “ Warriors do not lower themselves to the standards of other people; they live independently according to their own standards and code of honor. ”

    — Bohdi Sanders.


  • “ The world is a dangerous place to live; not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don’t do anything about it. ”

    — Albert Einstein.


  • “ Glory lies beyond the horizon challenge it because it is unreachable. ”

    — Iskander/Fate Zero.


  • “ What is defeat? Nothing but education. ”

    — Wendell Phillips.


  • “ The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting. ”

    — Sun Tzu.


    • soolidsnake
